description: Michael Cheek scores twice from the spot as Bromley crush Accrington Stanley 4-0 in League Two.
title: Bromley 4-0 Accrington Stanley
maintext:
This will be just the second ever Football League meeting between Bromley and Accrington Stanley, with the Ravens winning the reverse fixture 2-1 in December last year.
Accrington Stanley have failed to win any of their last four league games against sides from London (D2 L2) since defeating AFC Wimbledon on home soil in February last year (2-0).
Bromley have won three of their last six home league games (D1 L2), with each victory also witnessing them keep a clean sheet in the process.
